metadata.title: Convert UK Gallons to Liters – Volume Converter
metadata.description: Convert volume from UK Gallons to Liters, useful for UK and Commonwealth volume measurements.

introduction: This converter transforms volume measurements from UK Gallons to Liters, enabling UK to metric volume understanding.
The UK gallon is larger than the US gallon and used in UK, Ireland, and Commonwealth nations.
This converter uses the standard relationship where 1 UK gallon equals approximately 4.54609 liters.
methodology: 1 UK gallon ≈ 4.54609 liters. To convert UK gallons to liters, multiply by 4.54609. For example, 1 UK gal ≈ 4.55 L, 10 UK gal ≈ 45.5 L.
Fuel consumption is specified in miles per gallon in UK, liters per 100 km in Europe. Converting enables comparison.
Cooking recipes from UK sources use gallons while international recipes use liters.
This converter provides precise volume conversions for UK contexts.
examples: Example 1 – Fuel: A 50-liter fuel tank is approximately 11 UK gallons.
Example 2 – Recipe: A 1 UK gallon recipe container holds approximately 4.55 liters.
Example 3 – Beverage: A 5 UK gallon barrel holds approximately 22.7 liters.

faqs.question: What is the conversion from UK Gallons to Liters?
faqs.answer: 1 UK gallon ≈ 4.54609 L. Multiply UK gallons by 4.54609 to get liters.

faqs.question: What is the difference between UK and US gallons?
faqs.answer: 1 UK gallon ≈ 4.546 L. 1 US gallon ≈ 3.785 L. UK gallons are about 20% larger.

faqs.question: How many liters in a pint (UK)?
faqs.answer: 1 UK pint = 0.568261 liters. 1 UK gallon = 8 pints.

glossary.definition: Imperial unit of volume equal to approximately 4.546 liters.
SI unit of volume, standard metric measurement.
